One feast later, you moan as you cradle your stuffed gut in the passenger's seat of Melody's pickup. Mom's--technically now your--friend has always been a big eater, but you can't recall her ever eating that much. Or Mom, for that matter. It's a miracle you don't feel ready to burst. Uncomfortably stuffed, yes, but not to that degree. You can only assume enlarging your gut also boosted your max capacity.

"Not used to eating like that?"

You look over at Melody. She doesn't look the slightest bit winded from her half.

"No," you reply. Stifling a belch, you add, "It was good, though. Really good."

Melody grins in amusement and...something else. You're not sure, but you think you see a strange look in her eyes. "Glad to hear it," she says. "Better to indulge a healthy appetite than keep it under wraps, I say."

"Do you now."

"I do." She pats her belly for emphasis. "And you don't seem to disagree, if what I saw is any indication."

You blush, look down at yourself. Your belly looks ready to explode out of your shirt. "Well..."

"Yes?"

You look back at her. She's leaning towards you slightly, as though expecting something. Her smile seems eager, somehow. Weird.

"I mean, um..." You drum your fingers on your belly. "Like I said, I can't believe what I've been missing. It felt...it felt nice to just not worry about my waistline for once."

"I'll bet!" Melody says with a laugh. She leans toward you a little more. "Think you might wanna do that again sometime?"

"Um..."

"Because I'll be honest with you Sarah, you look great with a little extra meat on your bones."

You open your mouth, but don't reply. Does she mean that? More importantly, do you agree? You can't deny you find something about your new body arousing. So big and soft and shapely...

A giggle snaps you out of your thoughts. "See? You know I'm right."

You're confused for second, but quickly realize what she's getting at. You're smiling. Unsure how to respond, you just laugh nervously.

Melody raises an eyebrow, then shrugs and starts the truck. "Well, we can always talk about it later. Right now, we need to get you some new clothes!"

The drive to the mall passes by uneventfully. You and Melody make small talk. How your family is doing, how hers is doing, some work-related stories you couldn't get to during lunch, things like that. You try to sneak in questions about her solo project, but she dodges all of them with a "Not now" and a wink.

That aside, you're surprised at how easily you're keeping up the small talk. You recall Mom's memories with ease and recount them as though you were actually there. It's not like you're trying that hard either; your mouth just sort of moves on its own. For a former teen boy, you pull off the working mom routine pretty well. Must be the fact you're more Sarah- more Mom than Johnny- than John now.

Your head feels kinda weird...

------

Your gut is still stuffed by the time you two arrive at the mall, but you're not bothered by it. You feel confident enough to lug your digesting feast around. More importantly, that strange feeling in your head is gone. A side effect of the DownMinder, probably.

"So where do you want to start?" Melody asks as the two of you make your way through the parking lot. "Dresses? Work clothes? Something to wear around the house?" She glances down at your butt. "Underwear?"

You decide to ignore that. "Let's see... Work clothes first. I don't want to risk bursting out of my pants on the clock."

"Makes sense."

"Right. So those first, then underwear, then some at-home stuff... Maybe a dress or two, if I have enough money leftover."

"Sounds good!" She pats your back awfully close to your butt. Close enough that her fingers graze against it. You stare at her, which she ignores. "I'll let you pick the first store."

"How generous," you dryly remark.

------

You end up going with Torrid first. You like their selection of work attire best.

Well, Mom does. Same difference at this point.

It's hard to find clothes that don't emphasize how big you are--not to mention Melody keeps steering you in that direction--but you're not exactly bothered by it. If anything, you like it. Even trying things on in the changing room, which you always considered a pain as John, excites you. Seeing all your soft, supple flesh displayed in its half-naked glory makes you want to do a little "hand-on" exploration. You refrain, though. Better save that for later tonight.

Jeggings, leggings, work shorts, tanks, blazers, even a couple jumpsuits. They range from white, to black, to deep blue, with a bit of tan and red thrown in for some color variety. Each ensemble you put together brings a smile to your face. Everything hugs your enlarged butt and belly, but it feels so much comfier than letting them peek out of a stretched out pair of pants and shirt, respectively. Melody approves of them too, especially the ones she recommends. She seems particularly fond of a pair of white jeggings that really highlight your butt.

It's not a cheap haul. In fact, you're considering just buying a few pairs of panties and calling it a day after this.

Then Melody decides to pay for everything she recommended. "My choice, my treat," she tells you.

"Are you sure?" you ask. "Can you afford to spare that much?"

Her choices account for about half of it. The pricier half, too.

"Oh, don't worry about it." She waves a hand dismissively. "My little project's given me some money to burn."

Right, her solo project. You consider asking about it again, but decide against it; she'd just avoid the question.

So the two of you pay for everything and leave the store. "Thanks for that," you say to her.

"No problem. Gotta make sure you look your best. Maybe even seduce your boss into giving you a raise."

"I don't think I'm his type."

"Well that's his problem." You both stop at the directory. "So now what?"

Hey, she stared at yours. Fair's fair.

After that, it's your turn to take the lead as you head on over to Lane Bryant. Your (mom's) preference for their styles has you giddy at the thought of stuffing your curves into undergarments.

Now let's see, bras... You don't need them since you haven't grown your breasts at all, but why not go up a size or two? It'd help balance out your belly and ass. But which kinds of bras work best for you? Sports bras would be good for support. Like that sky blue one made with floral lace. Or that cute pink mesh one! Sure, you're a little old for cute at this point, but nobody (aside from Mel) has to know. A plunge bra or two wouldn't hurt; some of them have some nice patterns. T-shirt bras will make for some good all-purpose undergarments. They tend to be basic in design, but that's fine. And of course, you'll need matching panties to go with them all.

All this thinking about women's underwear reminds of when you were kid. As a young boy of about eight years and the only male in the family, you couldn't help but be curious about girls' clothes. There's this one time Mom caught you sneaking into her closet and trying on her bras and panties. It was funny, but also cute in its own way. Little Johnny only ever had you for a role model, so of course he'd try to imitate you however he could. His look of confusion as you explained why you need bras while he never would always stuck out in your mind. He even said he wished he was born a girl! You laughed that off at the time of course, but to this day part of you still wonders if he genuinely feels that way.

... Wait.

Did you just- Ugh, your head feels weird again.

"Sarah?"

Thankful for a distraction, you turn to see Mel giving you a concerned look. "Oh, uh, sorry," you say, "did you say something?"

"I was just asking if everything's alright." She points to the clothes rack in front of you. "You were staring at that pretty hard."

You turn to see what she's talking about: a white, see-through lingerie bodysuit made of floral lace and mesh. Your first thought is how sexy you'd look in that. Your second is a self-reminder that you're not looking for lingerie right now. Besides you're pretty much overhauling your whole wardrobe; pleasure spending wasn't the best idea right now.

"I could buy it for you, y'know. My treat."

You turn back to Mel. She has that weird eager look in her eyes again. Biting your lip, you reply, "Oh, no. You've treated me plenty already."

"It's fine, don't worry about it." She held up a bunch of sets of bras and panties. "Look, I even picked out some ideas while you were busy imagining how sexy you'd look in that lingerie."

Your cheeks flush a bright red. "I wasn't doing that!" You sigh at her skeptical stare and inspect her choices. Plunge, strapless, even a pushup (they have those here?). They tend towards more revealing designs. And her choice in panties were either flashy or skimpy thongs. No doubt they all accentuate your curves too. Tempting, but not very Sarah Wallace. "I don't usually go for these..."

"Oh, just try 'em! I'll cover whichever ones you take."

"If I take any," you mutter as you look them over again. With another sigh, you take them and say, "But sure, I'll give them a shot. Let me just pick out a few of my own first."

Mel beams. "Perfect! Let me know if you come around to the bodysuit and I'll treat you to that too."

Blushing again, you move past her and start searching for those sports bras. As you do, though, you can't help imagining yourself in that lingerie...

------

Your choices are pretty much guaranteed purchases the moment you pull them off the racks. Since you only need to replace your panties, you limit yourself to the three bras you considered on the way here. 38J. A good two sizes bigger than you are now, but not too dramatically huge. Your back should adapt just fine. Probably. Hopefully.

Finding the right sized panties wasn't too hard; you just added an X to your current size. They're a bit loose. Growing your ass a bit must have put you halfway between sizes. Oh well, you think with a smirk, an easy fix.

The whole time you're trying them on, you have keep yourself from fawning over and fondling your body. Even the act of fitting each breast into the bra cups or slipping the panties up your legs makes you want to just stop and dig your fingers into your doughy figure. You probably would too, if it wasn't for the fact you're in public. Still, that heat between your legs sure is distracting. It's completely alien to you, yet familiar at the same time.

Regardless, you have to commend yourself for being such a natural at this. Mom's muscle memory must have been included in the transfer.

Once you get to Mel's picks, though, your feelings become a little more conflicted. Part of you--no doubt the Mom part--is apprehensive about wearing something so...saucy. Sarah Wallace never wears anything like this. It's just not her style.

And yet, somehow that same part of you also wanted to give them a shot. Maybe the eagerness the John part of you has been feeling about this whole experience is influencing the Mom part of you. Maybe you've taken over Mom's life while her self-esteem is on the upswing. Either way, this is a chance to try something new. Might as well take it.

Mel must have a knack for gauging people's sizes, because most of her choices actually fit. Funny, you can't recall Mom ever mentioning hers to anyone. Well, aside from her bra size, but that's only when she's complaining about finding something that fits. Or the weight.

But back to Mel's selection, one thing strikes you as interesting. Odd, even. All the ones that don't fit? They're all larger sizes. If she's just guessing at your size, there should be at least a few tighter fits. But no; everything either fits perfectly or is just a bit too big. Not that that's a problem, you think with a smirk. You'll just grow into them.

You have to commend her tastes in style, too. Both the bras and panties are a touch more revealing than your choices. They also accentuate your curves more, especially the pushup that really emphasizes your cleavage. You find it hard to say no to any of them.

"I'll take all of them," you tell Mel as you exit the changing room.

Mel smiled. "Great! I knew you'd come around! What made you change your mind, if you don't mind my asking?"

"Oh, uh..." You suddenly feel a bit sheepish and glance away. "Just decided it's time for a change of pace, I guess."

Mel nods, her smile turning knowing while her eyes flash that strange look she keeps giving you. What's going on in that head of hers, you wonder.

Before the silence goes on too long, you say, "I'm surprised you guessed my size so accurately."

Chuckling a little, she shrugs and replies. "It's my superpower."

You laugh at that. "Oh really?"

"Really!" She leans in closer, her smile turning into a lopsided grin, and stage whisper, "Don't tell anyone, but I'm actually a superhero who can tell a person's clothing size just by looking at them."

You scoff. "And your superhero mission is to help people improve their fashion sense?"

"Pretty much." She chuckles again. "But really, I don't know how I do it. I look at someone and I can just tell."

"That's some good intuition." You ponder the undergarments you're currently holding. "So if you can accurately judge my size, why the looser fits."

"Just in case you plan on doing any more growing." With a knowing smirk, she adds, "Which you apparently do."

Heat rises to your cheeks. You sputter few false starts, then shut up. She's right, of course, but coming right out and saying it is just...

"Hey, no shame in that." Mel wraps an arm around your waist. As much as she can, anyway. "I told you, a little extra padding can only do you good."

Well, it's not like you disagree with her...

"Well anyway," you say after a moment, "let's go ring these up." You're about to head to checkout, but Mel maintains her grip. "What?"

"What about the bodysuit?"

Oh, right. That. Your persisting blush deepens. You can't help imagining yourself in that bodysuit.

You bite your lip. "Sure, if you don't mind. You're spending a lot on me as is and all..."

"Don't worry about it! No expense it too much for you, I promise. Besides, I've got lots of money to burn."

"Thanks," you mumble. How many different kinds of embarrassment do you feel right now? At least three?

Mel pulls you closer. "Anything for you, Sarah."

"Time flies when you're having fun," Mel replies. "Need to head back and get started on dinner?"

Ah, that's right. Now that you're acting as the matriarch of the household, it's on you to keep everyone fed. But you're not feeling up to preparing anything, truth be told. You've had your mind set on pizza since this morning anyway.

Well, Mom's had her mind set on it. But you're pretty much Mom now, so same difference.

"I do want to head back," you say, "but I'm just going to order pizza."

"Mmm, that sounds good. Might order some myself, actually. It's the perfect meal for us big girls, don't you think?"

You snort. "And I assume you'll get a large all for yourself."

"Extra-large, but yes." Mel looks back at you with a grin. "One for me, one for the girls. That's how we always do it."

Mel has two daughters, but neither of them have half the appetite she does so theirs will probably be a medium.

Speaking of her daughters, you have to wonder what Mel's current financial situation looks like. As she's also a single mom, she has to cover all the living expenses all by herself (assuming neither of her kids worked part-time). So could she cover all that while still having enough to splurge on a friend's shopping trip? That mystery project of hers has to be paying her a small fortune! God, now you really want to know about it! You don't ask, though. She won't tell until she's ready.

As you're lost in thought, the two of you drop off the haul. As you buckle in, your thoughts turn to how you'll handle your own pizza dinner. Mom always just buys one large for the four of you to share. Janet and Briana only have one slice each while you and Mom have two. You have-- well, had the old growing boy excuse, but Mom always swears she'll just have one only to go back on her word every time. If lunch today has taught you anything, it's that Mom has a ravenous appetite that's almost impossible to keep in check. Especially when presented with such good, fattening food.

But back to the (lack of) portion control, today's feast of a lunch has you convinced Mom could devour a whole large by herself. Maybe even an extra-large. Something about knowing Mel can do it makes you...

"Maybe I'll try it your way this time."

Mel, having been focused on driving up to this point, turns to you. "What? You mean one for yourself, one for the kids?"

You think it'd be neat to be able to have a supersized or shrunken version of yourself, but because Janet took all your clothes you couldn't do that anymore. "Janet's gonna be sorry she messed with me." You told yourself as you washed some clothes in the basement well into the night preparing to mess with Janet tomorrow when she came to pick up her clothes.

Long after the sun had gone down you finally collapse onto your bed in your room. You felt the bed buckle a little bit under the extra weight it wasn't used to. "Probably should have gone to mom's bedroom tonight." Was the last thing you thought before you passed out with dreams of sweet revenge plotting in your head.

The next morning came and you found yourself awoken by a loud rumbling. You wake up thinking that it was an earthquake or something and you had to get out of there, but an aftershock hit and your realized the sound was coming from your stomach. "I guess a good hearty breakfast wouldn't hurt before I get back to plotting." You said as you went to the kitchen and got to work. After a long night of doing laundry you were feeling very famished. You went ahead and cooked a full trey of bacon in the oven, a half dozen eggs scrambling on the stovetop, and a bunch of pancakes sizzling on the grittle. "Can you make chocolate chip pancakes mommy?" You heard a voice come from below you. You looked down to see Briana was standing on her tip toes to tug at your skirt. You mouth began to water at the thought, "That's be best idea you've ever had Briana, chocolate chip pancakes coming right up." And so you put plenty of chips in the pancake batter and went to work. Once everything was cooked you put it all on the table and picked up Briana and put her beside the sale and pepper shakers that were perfect sized stools for her.

You thought you were forgetting something when you heard a knocking coming from Janet's old room. "Whoops can't forget about Mo...I mean Minnie." You let your mom out of the room, still marveling at the tiny version of Janet she appeared to be. Thankfully your mom hadn't gotten her memory back yet so you could still proceed with your mess with Janet plan without mom bugging you.

When you got back to the table you shouted out, "Briana! What the hell?" As you looked at your very little little sister as she was making snow angles out of the maple syrup on her pancakes. She looked at you happily not registering the anger in your voice, "See mommy! Look at what I made!"

"It's...lovely...but now I've got to do some more laundry." You picked up your tiny and sticky sister and took her to her bathroom where you helped her take off her clothes and gave her a new outfit. After putting Briana on the floor to make sure she was safe you went to the basement to wash the sticky doll clothes and went back upstairs to the dinner table where mom was digging in. It seemed like even with a new body your mom's appitate was something that wasn't going to change overnight. Smiling at the sight of Janet's face smeared in greese and syrup you looked at the counter where you had both yours and your mom's cell phones. It looked like Janet had just texted yours saying,

'Coming to pick up my clothes. You better not have messed them up.' You sighed, if there was any doubt in your mind that Janet didn't know it was you she found yesterday that doubt was now gone. But it seemed that Janet was on her way meaning you had to get your plan started.

11311121122222321132211.content:
You weren't going to use subtlety this time. That hadn't worked when you were doll sized and you weren't going to give Janet an opportunity to even think about turning the tables on you. It was time for the boyish way of doing things. Brute forcing it as a giantess.

With breakfast squared away, you cleaned up the table, along with Briana and mom. You then had mom carry Briana to the backdoor and gave them instructions to go play in the sandbox. Briana was more than happy to take command, guiding your mom along in having her build sandcastles which she could climb around on as forts. Mom occasionally rubbed her head as she struggled to keep up with everything that was happening. But her motherly instincts still kicked in with keeping her eyes on Briana at all times so she wouldn't wander off. The last thing you needed was Briana getting carried off by a wild animal.

While the girls played outside, you could lay your trap for Janet.

You went to your room and collected the mammoth sized dress, dragging it downstairs. Then, you removed the robes you were wearing while still keeping on your bra for support and panties.

Wearing the giant outfit wasn't much different from when you grew up from doll sized, though the outfit was only twice your height instead of five times your size. You had a much easier time digging your way through the hem and climbing up to the neck of the dress. Though your eyes did catch something interesting marked on the tag sewn into the back.

"Product of...Witch World Wide?"

You weren't given much time to ponder the name as a tingling filled through your entire body.

You held your arm out in the sleeve of dress as you watched it stretch further away from your field of vision. Then your other arm followed suit, giving you a rather uneven appearance. Despite the tree trunk sized arms you were sporting, your hands remained tiny and normal sized. Though the rest of you was quickly starting to catch up. Your breasts pushed against the lace of your bra, both the underwear and your flesh expanding outwards to fill the front of the dress. Your legs quivered as your thighs lengthened upwards, bringing your height well beyond seven feet tall. Your tiny feet struggled to hold everything up as your calves ballooned out and up, bringing your overall height to around eight feet.

You felt a few cranks in odd places around your back as your spine popped up a few notches. The living ceiling was fast coming closer to your head and you ducked as you swelled to your full height at 9'8. Your hands and feet soon sprouted to a matching size for the rest of you body. The last change came in the form of your head, which remained tiny on your huge body. It was bizarre to feel your entire skull expand as you snapped into place.

"Wow," your voice was deep and echoed in the house. "This is...Unreal."

It was like you were caught in a cage. The doors around the house were much too small for you at this scale. The ceiling grazed against your head and you had to lean over to even fit comfortably. Most of all, everything looked tiny. Even the clothes on the floor that you had folded into a neat pile before you had begun. And the smaller pile of other outfits for "persuasive" use if Janet proved difficult. There was going to be no escaping the house unless you were a normal size.

Fortunately, your grey was coming to you.

"And now we wait."

~

Ten minutes later and Janet came marching through the front door, still sporting her expanded breasts which looked almost comical stuffed inside her tight, pink hoodie.

"Alright, hand them over. I have a date tonight and--GAH!"

You didn't even give her a chance to shriek as your hand, which could fit her entire head in your palm, clasped around her face. Your other hand snatched her waist and hoisted her into the air. At 5'6, Janet probably weighted in the lower hundred pound range being so thin. But at your scale, such weight was trivial. All of your muscles had expanded with your new height and you were able to effortlessly hold her up to your face.

"Hello there, shrimp," you said with a booming voice.

Janet's eyes widened with fear as she took all of your in. Her mind looked like it was racing processing the fact that her mother was now twice her usual height. And holding her in your chubby grip. You released her mouth to let her catch her breath. Long enough to allow her to sputter out the words.

"What the...How...?"

But you weren't in the mood for games. "Where are my clothes, Janet?"

When she tried to squirm, you used your free hand to clasped both her wrists together. You let her dangle in midair, holding her by her arms as she tried kicking her way to free. Futilely.

"I didn't do anything with them--"

"Don't lie," you squeezed her wrists tighter so the bones popped a little. "I know you took them to get back at me. Thinking you could pull a fast one on me. Well, the tables have turned. What did you do with them? Give them back."

The look of panic on your sister's face was almost sickeningly sweet were it not for her stone cold silence. You hoisted her another foot higher towards the ceiling.

"Well? Where are they?"

She gulped. "I gave them away."

"You WHAT!?"

Your voice bellowed at such a volume that the entire house shook. Janet had a look of pure terror being at your mercy. You had the mind to crush her into a ball if you didn't need information.

She took a deep breath and continued.

"I gave them away to a Goodwill store. You'll never know which one if you hurt me though."

You were suddenly in deep shit. Without your old clothes, there was no way to get your body back. Even if you put on male clothing, it still wouldn't be your old form. You would be stuck forever.

You glared, bringing Janet directly at eye level with you. "Show me."

"Gladly! Just, put me down and shrink yourself back to normal."

"Fat chance," you mumbled. "You're just going to overpower me if I do that."

"Well, you can't go outside like that! People will think you're some sort of monster."

You smirked, thankful at your preparation. "True enough. That's why we're both going to slip into something a little smaller as we go on a little outing together. Mother and daughter bonding time."

With your one hand still holding Janet up by the wrists, you leaned over and grabbed at the small pile next to your mother's clothes. You could hold the outfits between two of your fingers.

You had collected the red onesie that was meant for someone 2'10. That would leave Janet the size of a very little girl if you forced her to wear it. The other option was the old Barbie doll dress. That would make her very manageable for you and small enough to fit inside your mom's purse. Finally, you had come up with something special in case you were feeling sadistic enough.

One way or another, you were going to force her to wear something so you could keep her under control while at the Goodwill together.

You held up a tiny little sweater that sat on the on your enlarged finger. "I'll never fit in that, it's freaking doll size."

You gave your sister a playful shake in your hand, "Don't be dumb, I washed it special just for you last night. Now. Put it on." You loosened your grip on Janet just enough so she could grab the tiny sweater. From the look in her eyes it looked like she was debating if it was worth it to try and run for it, but evidently she decided she didn't think she could get away with it and put her arm into the sweater. As you'd seen a number of time now, it took a bit of work for Janet to push her arm in, but the magic laundry detergent made it so the fabric wasn't going to rip as Janet practically forced her arm into the tiny arm holes. Sure enough after some work an arm the size of a hot dog emerged from the sweater arm. With one down she put her other arm in and started to work on getting it over her head. In order to actually accommodate the head, Janet's own began to shrink down to fit through the head hole. As soon as her head was out and her mouth was free she said, "Fine, there. Happy? I'm about to be a little twerp. Now shrink down and let's go to the stupid store already.

With a sly smile you said, "I'll change once you're done. Look down and you'll see you're not done yet."

"I know I'm not done yet I'm still shrinking down and....WHAT THE!?!?!" Janet let out a string of curses that you were glad Briana wasn't around to here. As you laughed at Janet, she continued to curse as she looked down at her hands that were slowly turning into paws.

"I'm surprised you didn't recognize Lucky's old doggy sweater, but I'm so glad you didn't. It made your reaction all the better."

"You can't make me a dog! I'm your sister!"

"Well my sister is a jerk who stole all her sweet brother's clothes knowing or at least guessing he needed them to turn back. So unless John and his body are back in his room by tonight, you're going to stay a dog for ever and Briana gets a new pet. She was too young to know Lucky from when we were growing up. Don't you think it'd be nice for her to grow up with Lucky like we did? Huh girl? Huh?" You patted your massive thighs as though talking to an overexcited dog.

Janet continued to curse at you until her mouth began to form a muzzle thanks to the sweater's magic spreading. You noticed Janet looking around and stop on the normal sized mom outfit you were about to change back into. "Don't even think about it Janet." You said warningly, "That's for me. And just a warning, if we don't come back with my clothes, I'm totally fine with getting rid of every magically washed item in this house and living as mom for the rest of my life just so you can't change back. It will be so worth it just to feed you kibble every morning. Maybe I'll even let you drink out of the toilet. How does that sound?"

Janet growled at you, she obviously didn't like that. "Well you should have thought of that before you stole my stuff." You gently picked up the fuzzy white labradoodle which was more like a chihuahua to you, and put her in a cage you had also assembled last night. You then took off the massive dress you were wearing and slowly put back on your mom's normal sized clothes. As you began to shrink down from the ceiling you felt a bit disappointed that you couldn't actually really test out your strength and size, but sadly you didn't think you could really do that unless you went outside and being a 9'8" woman outside might draw too many questions.

Once you were back to mom's normal 4'10" frame you poked your head outside and saw your mom and Briana playing in the sandbox with Briana now standing a top a 3 story high castle. "Be careful girls! I'm going out for a while, Minnie, please keep an eye on Briana and don't let that castle get too big." Briana waved goodbye as your mom kept a close eye to make sure Briana didn't knock over her own tower.

With that addressed you smiled down at your older sister and with glee you attached a collar and leash to her neck. She bared her teeth and growled but you countered with a simple. "Remember. Kibble." And that shut her up. You took her to the car and drove along passing all the Goodwills in town until finally Janet started barking like crazy. The two of you got out and you approached a man who seemed to be the manager. Putting on your best and sweetest mom face you said, "Excuse me sir? My daughter, being the ditz that she is," That earned a growl from Janet, "Well she accidentally took all of her brothers clothes and donated them here. I was really hoping I'd be able to get them back. I'm sorry about the hassle."

The employee smiled and said, "No problem mam, I was here when she dropped them off, although I must say I'd have guessed she was your sister rather than your daughter."

"Oh you." You said feeling your face flush. This dude was just flirting with you! Or...your mom...or something. Maybe you'd have to tell her that if/when she got her memory back. After a few minutes the man returned with the news.

1131112112222232113221132.content:
"Well, ma'am," he said with a grave face. "I'm afraid I have some bad news."

You didn't like the sound of that. Suddenly the high from being flirted with faded away as you cleared your throat and tried your best to sound adult.

"What seems to be the problem?"

"Unfortunately, we see a lot of clothes from high school to college boys this time of year. Parents trying to get rid of any excess in a humane way with their kids back for the summer. Typically, when this happens, our store policy is to donate them to charity--"

"They were given away!?" you break character.

"--However," the employee continued. "We also run checks on the clothing to make sure its not infested with lice or something. Our tools detected that your son's clothes were coated in some unidentified material like a chemical. Wanting to be safe than sorry so whatever it was didn't end up hurting someone, my boss suggested we burn them."

In that instant, you were crushed. Next to you, Janet was whining. She knew that if you couldn't get back to being normal, she could kiss any chance of being human again good bye.

You collected yourself after a moment of silence and spoke through gritted teeth as you glared down at the tiny dog.

"I see...Was anything spared? Anything at all?"

"I'm sorry, ma'am. The boss spared nothing from your pile. He figured that whatever it was contaminating the clothes had spread to everything. We put everything into the oven this morning."

Your only way to get back to normal was suddenly up in flames. The employee must have sensed how devastated you were at the news as he rubbed the back of his head and sighed.

"Look...Maybe I can make it up to you in a small way. What if I gave you some store credit? It wouldn't be enough to replace your son's wardrobe entirely, but it'll let you get a few things you want for free."

You're too pissed to even register the generosity of the poor guy who's doing his best to comfort you. Though you still put on a fake smile.

"That's very kind of you, thanks."

"No problem. Here, let me just go and write you up a gift card."

While he's away, you plant your massive butt down on some nearby chairs for sale. You look down at your mother's bloated body, showing just enough cleavage through her dress. No wonder that man was flirting with you. You sigh heavily. Might as well get used to this body, because it's going to be yours for a while.

"I hope you're happy," you spit in Janet's general direction. "Now we're both screwed. And all because you had to be a complete bitch. Well, now you're going to be stuck as one for the rest of your miserable life. Or maybe I should shrink you down to an inch and flush you down the toilet. Down with the rest of the shit where you belong."

Janet whimpers and hides behind the chair away from you.

You sighed. Technically it wasn't her fault that the store had such a stupid policy. She probably just expected them to be sold and you forced to track them down while in trouble with your mother. Still, she was unnecessarily cruel when you hadn't even done anything to her.

This was a fine mess you were in and you were counting all the ways which you could try and get your way out of it.

The employee returned with the gift card, just enough that you could purchase probably a full outfit of anything you could choose from in the store.

That was one option...Try to rebuild a body of your choosing. If you were going to be prevented from ever being yourself again, maybe you could compensate by becoming the shape and size of whoever you wanted to be. Or get more clothes that you could experiment with once you got back home. In case you did want to become your mom only slightly taller. Or wider. Or have bigger breasts. The choices were endless, in that regard. And that was a little comforting.

Your thoughts also turned to the laundry powder. Maybe this situation had happened before and there was an emergency number that you could call on the bottle. Maybe someone could help you or provide a suggestion on your quest to return to normal.

Alternatively, you glared down at Janet, still whimpering from the floor. Maybe being a dog was too good for her. Maybe she deserved to be punished even further. Maybe that threat to shrink her down more held merit. Or maybe you could use her as a guinea pig for experiments with the clothes.

You were still numb as you went back to the car. You were in so much shock you actually forgot Janet in the store, but being a good little dog who knew you were her only hope of becoming human again she followed you quietly and obediently. You didn't even remember driving back home, your mind was just thinking about your life now. Until your mom got her memory back and who knows how long that could be, from now on you were the mom of the family, you'd last over 20 years of your life, your gender, and all your friends. You thought about everything you'd lost as you made your way back home. You didn't even stick the knife in Janet any more as you simply opened the back door when you got back and said, "Girls, I got you a new dog. Meet Lucky." You didn't evens stay back to watch Briana scream with joy as she jumped off the top of her sand castle or see mom dive to catch her as she tried to remember why a family dog named 'Lucky' was familiar to her.

You just went to the basement and looked at the laundry powder that had caused your troubles. It was all supposed to be so much fun. Just mess with your body and your family a little bit, but now it seemed that you would never get to be John Wallace again. And while that life wasn't perfect, it was yours and you wanted it back. As you picked up the laundry detergent in your chubby hands you read the back a little bit closer and noticed a label.

Product of Witch World Wide and underneath that was a contact number. You didn't even remember dialing it, but next thing you knew your phone was in your ear and the other line said, "Witch World Wide customer service, how may I direct your call?"

"Um, yes, my name is John Wallace and I've been using your Witch Wash product."

"Ah, yes mam, or would you prefer sir?"

"I'd like to be sir, that's kind of what I'm calling about." And so you poured your heart out about how you now had your mom's body and your sister had gotten rid of all your old clothes leaving with you no chance to turn back.

"I'm sorry to hear about your problems sir, I'll do everything I can to walk your through all the possible options to help you. But first I should inform you that this cauldron call may be monitored for customer assurance purposes. Now, Mr. Wallace. Are you sure that ALL of your old clothes were destroyed? There's nothing laying under the bed? Nothing that you loaned to a friend? Any older clothes in the attic? We should try to find a simple solution before trying to use more...magical options."

You sat the basement quietly not phone trying to think of any little scrap of clothing that may be in the house.

Your can't think of anything that would be in the house. But the customer service girl makes you think of something you might have loaned to someone else. Nope, nothing like that. What about other options? When do you wear clothes? You do it all the time, so when you suddenly stop to think about things it's rather hard to come up with anything you don't already keep in the house.

There is one thing that does come to mind.

"...There might be my gym clothes at school," I said.

"Are you absolutely sure about that ma--I mean--sir? You sound a little uncertain."

"No, I need to check something," you say. "Can I get your number to call you back in case this doesn't work out?"

"Certainly!" The girl chimes in and rattles over a direct line phone number for you to use. "We'll keep your ticket open until this matter gets resolved. Thank you for choosing Witch World Wide!"

You roll your eyes a bit as you hang up. The customer service girl is, a least, helpful. But she's a little too preppy about everything. You imagine she has to be considering some of the things she must see everyday on the job.

Instead of putting the phone down, you immediately begin to dial your school's number.

"Sunnyspring Valley High School. This is Jill Dowley at the administration office. How can I help?"

"Hello, Mrs. Dowley," you return to acting like your mother. "This is Miss Wallace, John Wallace's mother."

"Oh. Hey, Sarah. How's the husband hunt been going?"

You decide to speed through the small talk, being impatient. "Good...Good...Listen, my son accidentally left his Game Boy in his gym clothes before school closed for the summer. Is there any chance I can come by and pick them up?"

School closed just last week. You were in the middle of starting your big summer break when this whole problem with laundry powder began. Given chores to do with your time off, because of course you were. Especially when Janet was home.

"Oh, didn't you hear?" asked Mrs. Dowley. "The whole building is shut down due to flooding from the storm last Friday. You should see it. All the hallways have literal rivers flowing through them because the plumbing is busted to boot. The epicenter seems to be the gym too. Everything there is soaked. Your son's toy is probably ruined."

More problems, you fight cursing on the line. "Can I still go and check?"

"No can do, Sarah. The whole building is on lock down because it's a safety hazard to be in there. Only faculty are allowed with everything else shut tight so no one gets inside."

"How long is it going to take before its fixed?" you fight a groan.

"Dunno. A month, at least. And then there's going to be repairs going on, making it an construction zone so they can get it set before school starts. Trust me, you're better off waiting. Everything got ruined. Heck, I'd be surprised if you could even find your son's clothes. It was a mess in there, last I looked."

"I see," you muttered through gritted teeth. "Well, thanks for telling me."

You hang up and throw the phone onto the couch. "And thanks for nothing too."

You sighed and collapsed onto the couch, as well. Your mother's weight causes the whole thing to sag and you don't even care that your boobs are flopping everywhere.

The simplest solution to fixing your body problem just got a whole more complicated.

You almost wonder if it would be even worth all the effort to find a way to break into the school, given the circumstances. Though the customer service girl sounded rather hesitant to suggest the magical alternatives to getting back to normal. Something about using more magic to fix magic sounded unpleasant.

No, you were going to go for this route. It was just breaking into the school. How hard could that be?

Pretty hard, considering you were presently a 4'10 fat woman with no athletic ability whatsoever. You did, however, possess a wardrobe of magical clothing that could alter your shape in an instant. Perhaps using them would allow you to hold a successful heist. And Mrs. Dowley did say that faculty were allowed inside. If you could nab one of your teacher's clothes, you could break in without even having to do something dangerous.

You might also be able to recruit help through the customer service rep too. She did give you her number. Maybe she might be able to provide you with some tools that could allow your heist to go without a hitch.

Alternatively...There was always the waiting game. It sounded like repairs could take a couple of months, or your entire summer. You supposed that you could spend time as your mom and just wait it out, go in safely that way. You'd care for your sisters and mom and get more familiar with the laundry powder as a result.
