11311121122222321132211322113.content:
If you were going to do this, you might as well see what every tool in the toolkit was before committing to it. Perhaps the customer service rep would be able to provide assistance either in suggestion or, at the very least, support. It was nice to actually share all your problems with someone, after all.

You pick up the phone again and sit up from the couch and dial the number she gave you with your stubby little fingers.

A familiar voice answered on the line. "Hello? Witch World Wide? You've reached Autumn's desk."

"Hi there. This is John Wallace. I called earlier about some trouble I'm having..."

"Oh, Mr. Wallace! I was hoping you'd call back, actually. I've been doing a little research on your family's account with us."

"Our account?" you asked. "You mean with the laundry powder, right?"

"That was your latest purchase with us, yes. However, it appears your mother also bought one of our Deluxe One Size For All dresses a couple of years ago."

That mention suddenly jogs your memory of the massive 9'8 dress that's presently sitting on the top shelf of your bedroom wardrobe, away so that Janet can't reach it.

"Wait a minute," you say. "That dress is from you guys?"

"Correct, sir. It's from our clothing line. You might have noticed two bits of string along the waist of the dress. And by--"

"Hold one moment," you say as you march upstairs with the phone to your ear.

You make it to your bedroom and collect the dress, holding it up as the hem falls to the floor. Sure enough, there are two bits of string exactly where Autumn says there is. You never noticed them before and just assumed they were a part of the dress.

"Okay, I found it. Now what do they do?"

"Well, by tugging on the wearer's left string, you can actually shrink the dress. Meanwhile, if you tug the right string, it will grow. It was a popular model we found until our Witch Wash product was invented to make all clothes one size fits all."

Amazed, you begin tugging at the left string and, sure enough, the dress begins to shrivel up in size in your hands, the material folding away into a more manageable size meant for someone around 6 feet before you release the string and the shrinking stops. You test the other string and the material begins to grow again. This time, you don't stop at 9 feet and let it keep going until its too much of a handful. You cease the experiment when the dress looks like it would fit someone 12 feet tall.

"Holy crap," you fumbled with you phone and curse over the line. "This is amazing! I had no idea it could do this!"

"Yeah, that was why the product was not very well received. People kept getting confused why were sending them giant outfits, which are the detail size for sewing them to make life easier for our seamstress. But all outfits have a scale of ten centimeters to one thousand."

You quickly do the conversions in your head. That's about 3 inches to 33 feet tall!

"I know that's not exactly helpful to your situation," continued Autumn. "But I figured you should know."

"No, it's actually extremely helpful," you reply, a smile forming on your face. "You see, there might be some old gym clothes of mine still at the school. But unfortunately the school is on lockdown due to flooding. I need to come up with a way to get inside and this might be really useful. I already washed the dress with the laundry powder, see..."

"Oh, wow! That's pretty clever. By wearing the dress then, you should be able to control how big or small you are on a whim. Very useful for a break in. Might I suggest some other alternatives to make this project easier for you?"

"Sure," you laughed. "Though you sound awfully eager to help with a heist."

"Witch World Wide is not responsible for any illegal activities that come as a result of our products," she says like she is reciting the back of a medicine bottle. "Anyway, it sounds like the school will be empty of a lot of people. But I would bet there will be a janitor or two mopping things up. Might I suggest our Possession Pills?"

"What do they do?"

"By swallowing one, your spirit will leave your body and you can travel through walls. Then you can enter in someone else's body for a limited time period to hold physical shape. You'll morph them into your own form and be able to walk around as them for ten minutes. Good for pranks or spying on your troublesome children when they leave the house without telling you. In your case, however, you can use it to find someone in the school to make your search easier. With a time limit, of course."

That could be interesting. "Do you have anything else that might be useful?"

"Off the top of my head? We could send you some sleeping potions or love potions. I'm sure you could use both to acquire some outfits that you can then use the laundry powder on."

That would make your earlier idea of getting a teacher's outfit that much easier. It was nice to have so many options open to you.
11311121122222321132211322113.title: Magical Aid

choices: You threw up, change size that quickly isn't advisable
You'd accidentally ripped the size changing string completely off
Briana comes in riding Janet and they see you
113111211222223211322113221131.content:
"Thanks for the offer, but I think the dress will be more than enough." You said into the phone, the other items could be useful to him but he was just breaking into the school, he wasn't breaking into Fort Knox, it couldn't be that difficult could it?

"Very well, but if you have any future problems or desire more products for you everyday magical needs please feel free to contact Witch World Wi-." Autumn said cheerfully as John hung up before she finished her spiel. John looked at the clock and saw it was just barely in the afternoon. Wanting to commit the best heist possible John thought that he should wait until night before going through with the break in. John eyed the dress with a glimmer in his eyes. "Well...I should probably practice with the dress before I go through with the heist." And then with enthusiasm that only real life magic could provide John stripped down to his bra and panties and slipped on the dress. John immediately felt himself shooting up, after all he'd left the dress on a size where he'd be 12 feet tall. John smiled and laughed as his watched his feet grow until they were as big as the chair he was sitting in. Speaking of that chair, it began to squeak and creek as John grew and grew in his mom's now gargantuin form until John heard a CRACK and collapse on the kitchen tile.

"Ow," John said rubbing his still plumping up back side. "Probably should have seen that coming." John stood up to pick up the chair pieces but slammed his head on the ceiling. "Double Ow!" John said as he rubbed his head that was still growing to fit the 12 foot dress. "Ok, this is really cool, but this house can't handle this big. I feel like I'm in Briana's doll house again." You began tugging at the left string and the dress began to squeeze your body, but it didn't squeeze it for long as you felt your body shrink down with the dress now. It seemed using the string to grow and shrink working a lot faster than using just the laundry powder. Eager to test this you tugged at the left string as quickly as you could. Down and down you went. The world grew around you at a fast pace. In a matter of seconds you were back to your mom's normal 4'10" frame and a second later you were the size of the current Minnie version of mom. But that wasn't enough, this was a rush! You kept pulling the string as you continued to go down and down. Soon the wooden scraps of the chair were eye level but there was more string to pull! You pulled some more and continued to shrink until you figured you were down to the minimum 10 centimeters tall.

"Wow," You said as you looked up at the kitchen which was now barely recognizable from your angle. You thought the world was small from when you were doll sized, but that was nothing compared to this you thought. Everything was like, 4 times bigger than even then. As you spun around the world looking at the marvel of being tiny you took a moment to take it all in until something stopped you.
113111211222223211322113221131.title: Stick with the size changing dress

choices: Make Briana big.
Make mom big.
Make Janet big.
1131112112222232113221132211311.content:
As you take one step forward, a wave of vertigo overcomes your senses. It was like you were rapidly changing sizes, up and down, at an instantaneous rate. Though you know this isn't the case, however, as you grasp the nearby piece of the chair to find you are still the same 10 centimeters tall. Unfortunately, that tidbit of knowledge doesn't convince the bubbling sensation in the pit of your stomach.

You lean over the couch fragment and start heaving. What remains of your breakfast comes pouring out of your mouth. It's a good thing you're almost three inches tall, as the mess gets contained to a small puddle barely bigger than a thimble full of water.

"Ugh," you groaned as the uneasiness slowly fades. "Maybe changing sizes so quickly like that isn't a good idea."

In a way, in makes sense. Your mind can't keep up with the process of your scale altering at such a rapid rate, even though you can adjust to it with time it's still a big change to comprehend. Even the thought of just presently being a 1/100 of the size you just were a second ago is enough to get you to start heaving again. Not smart to do. Come to think of it, if you were shrinking that small doesn't that mean your brain is also smaller? Wouldn't that make you stupider?

You retch up another wave as you tell yourself. "Stop. Thinking. Thoughts."

It takes a couple more minutes for you to calm down, all while still remaining in a cold sweat. Once the sickness stops, you take to pacing around the remains of your chair. The recovery period takes, on a whole, about ten minutes.

"Okay," you say, collecting yourself. "Let's try this again."

You prepare yourself to grow up again, as being stuck at 10 centimeters tall leaves your options quite limited at what you can do at this size. And it's almost lunch, so you're going to have to prepare food for the girls. You ready your stomach as you pull the right string.

In an instant, you feel a rising sensation as the ruins of the chair quickly disappear beneath your feet. The dress is expanding, and every part of your body is growing to fill the gaps within seconds. It's a vicious of cycle of growth and bloating that makes your belly churn.

Without a visual marker nearby, it's very hard to guess just how big you need to get to reach a normal height. You do a quick estimate to keep your mind off the fact that your perception of spacial awareness is changing at an unnatural rate. You lean up against the wall and put your hand at one spot where you'll tell yourself to stop. When you hit it, you release the string and the growing stops like the brakes of a car.

Your entire body wobbles in place as you shake off the disorientation. Not throwing up now, at least.

"Okay," you say. "Looks like I need a cool down time before using this thing. Like every ten minutes. Good to know."

That put a slight damper on your plans for the heist, but you imagined it would be the same even if you used multiple clothes and outfits. At least with this, you could keep wearing the same dress and not have to carry around an entire wardrobe with you.

You waddled as your stomach relaxed and your mind adjusted to the fact that you were a normal human height again. Though how tall you couldn't say until you brought out the measuring tape.

"6'5?" you gawked. It didn't feel like you had grown that tall. But everything felt big when you were 3 inches tall. You shake your head trying to comprehend that your mother is taller than you used to be as a boy.

Oh, well. You can shrink back down in ten minutes to something more suited to your mother's form. It's handy to have a size changing dress.

As you spend the next several minutes collecting the remains of the chair and cleaning up the droplet of vomit, you begin to ponder your plans for the evening. Now that you had the tools for the job, you could afford to set things in stone for the impending heist. You'd be handling it at night, as you decided. The dress idea clearly worked, with the slight drawback. But what else could you do to get ready?

The shouting outside grabs your attention. You lean out the window to see Briana atop of Janet, riding her like a mount. Your mother is chasing after them.

"Right. That."

There was the problem of leaving your family alone given the situation they were in. If they were all shrimps, you could see something going wrong when you would be out for who knew how long that night. If something happened to one of them, even Janet, you'd never hear the end of it.

Someone had to be normal sized in the Wallace household or you ran the risk of someone getting seriously hurt. Curse being in your mom's body, it was making you all responsible and shit.

You sighed and looked to the old 4'10 clothes on the counter. Briana seemed to have fun with the size changing, but that also sounded dangerous given her hyper nature. Giving the outfit to your mom would work as she was the most responsible of the bunch. But you were getting nervous about her memories coming back and letting her change back to her old body might refresh her memory entirely. Your gut instinct with making Janet big again was negative, but if you had a size changing dress how much trouble could she give you? You could just overpower her again as a giant.

For the sake of your family, you had to trust one of them with watching everyone while you were out.
1131112112222232113221132211311.title: Up and Out then Up Again

choices: Since she's becoming mommy, you should become Briana
She still wants to play Wedding with her dolls, but with you as the bride
Briana wants to be a super big mommy
11311121122222321132211322113111.content:
Thinking of your option you eliminated Janet immediately. There was no chance that after all the hell she'd put in through not only the last day but most of your life that you were giving up that chance to keep her as your pet dog, it was just too good. And mom was the logical...and perhaps the smartest choice, but you didn't want to give her her old body back yet since you thought it might help her get her memory back. You were having way too much fun being in charge of the house and going wild with the magic that she might put a stop to. So against your better judgment you knew there was only one choice left. You were about to go to the back yard to call the little ones in when your stomach gave an audible rumble.

"Sheesh, is mom never not hungry? I just threw up and I still feel like I could eat a horse." You looked in the kitchen and opened up the pantry and refrigerator and despite both being filled to the brim with food you didn't see anything that would require you to actually cook, and while you had your mom's body you didn't have her cooking skill outside of simple meals. So you opened up the back door and called out, "Girls! I'm ordering some pizza's what kind do you want?" You made the order and in 30 minutes or less 2 large supremes, 1 chicken and bacon, 1 ground beef, and 1 small extra cheese pizza arrived. With your mouth watering you happily gave the pizza boy tip and took the pizza into the kitchen. Mom was taking care of Briana as she set up a small eating area on top of the table by surrounding her with a cloth napkin so she would be less likely to just roll or jump off the table in a fit of hyper activity. Janet barked at your feet as you walked in with the pizzas.

"Sorry, no pizza's for bad dogs." You said with acid dripping from your voice as Janet growled at you. Then in a pang of guilt you actually remembered you hadn't gotten any dog food for her yet. "Fine." You said reluctantly as you opened up a box and took some of the meat off of the ground beef pizza and watched as Janet licked it off the ground.

You began to dig into the food and were surprised to see Minnie with the body of a 3'6" Janet was already half way through her supreme. 'Is that a sign she's getting her memory back?' You wonder, but you take it as a good sign that you'd making a good choice by not giving Minnie her real body back yet. Looking at Briana you actually choked on an olive when you laughed at the doll sized girl trying to eat a piece of cheese pizza handful by handful. After all, she couldn't exactly grab a whole slice and she didn't even have any utensils she could use. But Briana was totally digging in like she was having the time of her life. She ended up finishing first having eaten about 1/4 of one slice, but you were impressed as it still looked like a good chunk of her current body weight. After finishing off one of your pizza's you told your mom, "Minnie sweety, please put up the pizza's for later, looks like we'll be having pizza for supper too."

Minnie just nodded, she seemed to want to be motherly and wanted to protest having pizza for every meal, but she wasn't the adult so she didn't get a say. You then picked up your little sister and took her to the sink to help clean her up since she was practically covered in grease. As you helped her with her clothes Briana asked, "Can I wear the Barbie wedding dress next? I want to play Wedding next."

"Maybe later Briana, but I was thinking it was time to make you big again."

"Aw man. Do I have to?" The clearly disappointed little girl.

"Yes, but you'll a very special kind of big. You see, mommy has to run some errands later after supper and I need someone to be the mommy of the house and I can't think of anybody better than you."

"Really!"

"Yes really." You nodded as Briana let out a squeal of joy. You carefully took Briana to the living room where you had your mom's normal sized 4'10" outfit ready for Briana to put on and transform with. As you put her down and offered to help Briana put on the clothes she looked up to you and said, "You have to leave later right? So does that mean we can play a game before you go?"

Your instinct when Briana asked you to play with her was usually no, but Briana has been really good lately, especially good considering the magic that's entered your life. So deciding you might as well reward your sister with your presence you said, "Why not Briana, but I've got to leave after supper."

"Yeah!" Briana said as she told you want she wanted to play.
11311121122222321132211322113111.title: Decide to make Briana the big one

choices: You win the game.
Briana wins the game.
Janet or your mom wins the game.
113111211222223211322113221131113.content:
"I wanna be big," Briana hops up and down on the table she was standing on.

"That's the idea, sweetie. If you put these on..."

"No, I wanna be big like you are," she says, puffing up her cheeks. "And I want you to be small."

"Me be small," you repeated the request. "Why would you want that, sweetie?"

"Hide and seek!" she beams excitedly up at you. "I wanna be the biggest in the whole house and find you guys! If I win then I get to stay the biggest mommy."

You ponder that for a moment. "And if you lose?"

"I dunno. What do you want, mommy?"

You could think of all the useful things you could do with a willing test subject. And Briana was actually pretty excited to be trying all these new things with magic. It was probably just like a children's story to her. She would enjoy it.

"If I win then you have to help mommy with a few chores later," you say. "Fun chores. I promise. Sound fair?"

She smiles. "Yeah!"

"Now, why don't you go get dressed and I'll collect the girls to begin our little game?"

She chirps an "okay" as she crawls for the pile of your mothers clothes sitting on the living room table. You turn for the door as you leave to collect your mom and Janet from the kitchen. You also take the time to clean up everything and wrap up the pizza for future consumption that night. You can't help but note that mom looks a little piggier than usual. Maybe pizza every meal isn't such a good idea and you should give her a healthier diet so she doesn't end up chubby in this life as well.

With Janet in your giant arms and mom being pulled along by your hand, you return to the living room to find Briana putting the finishing touches on herself.

She had a little trouble with the bra, given how disheveled her chest looks, but she mostly figured out the outfit and all that's left is her tiny head on her new massive body, in comparison. That quickly changes with the hair scrunchie as her face balloons outwards into the familiar appearance of your mother.

"Hey," Briana realizes, speaking in your mother's voice. "Why are you still so big?"

You're still 6'5 and looking down at her, she barely comes up to your chest at her height. You had gotten so used to it that you hadn't even realized you had overshot your goal.

"I'll change when the game begins," you promise. "Then you'll be the biggest in the house. I swear."

She pouts, which is quite hilarious to see with mom's adult body. But her performance doesn't last long as she looks down and takes in her new self. You imagine that it's quite different to go from kid to adult. And Briana seems particularly fascinated with the two massive orbs on her chest which she begins to fondle.

"Briana don't play with yourself in public."

She turns red and snaps to attention. "Okay! I'm going to start counting to 100! Whoever wins gets something they want! Ready? Go!"

She didn't even give you time to prepare yourself. You release mom and drop Janet to the floor as the two of them scatter in separate directions. Janet heads for the basement while your mom makes her way towards her bedroom.

You go for the stairs and head up to your bedroom. This game of hide and seek will actually be good practice for tonight. You just wanted to wait before you shrank so it wasn't something Janet would take advantage of.

Once you're in the privacy of your room, you begin looking around for spots that would suit you at three inches tall.

"Something not at her eye level," you use the measurement of where she was at your chest to mark the highest point of your bookshelf. Too high for Briana to see over. "Here works."

With one hand on the shelf and the other on the left string of your dress, you take a deep breath and prepare your stomach. Back down to 10 centimeters for at least 10 minutes.

When you tug at the string and begin to shrink, you can instantly feel yourself dwindling down. You use your other hand to clasp at the book shelf and hold yourself off the ground as you lose more and more mass. Holding yourself up becomes a challenge as you begin to kick so the book shelf doesn't fall over. Eventually, you become small enough that your weight doesn't affect it.

Smaller and smaller you become as you hold on for dear life. The gap between the six foot bookshelf and the floor widens to the point where it feels like the fall will kill you. Even though you know from science class that, though it would still hurt, a fall for someone that small wouldn't be fatal unless you landed on your neck. You try not to think of such thoughts as the world grows around you.

Eventually, you can pull yourself onto the shelf entirely and walk around as you continue shrinking and shrinking. The books you keep up here are even bigger than you are when you finish. Perfect for hiding behind.

"She'll never find me up here," you decide with a smirk. "Good luck, Briana."

"READY OR NOT!" a loud voice echoes from downstairs. Though, at your size, it feels like its causing the whole house to rumble. "HERE I COME!"
113111211222223211322113221131113.title: The Biggest Mom

choices: You'd have to grow and break down the door
You needed to shrink through a crack in the wall
There's a security guard you have to get by
1131112112222232113221132211311131.content:
Even though you weren't really doing anything besides hiding behind your books, it was actually really exciting. You could hear Briana running around the house trying to find you, mom, and Janet. You had fun just using your imagination to picture Briana tossing and turning everything in the house looking for the three of you. Briana seemed to just be running room to room judging by the earth shaking sounds of Briana's feet stomping across the floor. After a while Briana eventually went into your room. Your heart jumped a little bit when you heard the russeling of pages below you. It looked like Briana was working her way up the bookshelf. You held your breath and said a little prayer hoping she wouldn't get to and find you, and by some miracle Briana's little kid attention span kicked in and she stopped looking at the bookshelf.

"Is John playing hide and go seek too?" You heard Briana say as she moved over your bed to see if she could find her brother. 'You'll see your brother again soon...hopefully.' You thought as you heard Briana toss all your blankets and pillows off of the bed. Finally Briana gave up her search and left the room. You figured you were safe but decided to just keep still until Briana admitted she gave up. And that seemed to take a while. Maybe a half hour later you heard Briana scream in your mom's voice, "NO! Bad lucky! Bad!" Your mind raced as you wondered what the heck Briana had caught Janet doing, and you considered leaving your hiding place to find out, but as curious as you were, you still wanted to beat your little sister at her little game.

Another half hour later you heard Briana let out another triumphant scream, "Got you Minnie! Got you! What were you doing in mommy's closet? You're not mommy." You laughed as you heard this, 'You have no idea how wrong you are sis.

Finally after another half hour or so you heard Briana shout out, "Okay mommy, I give up! You win!" You gave a little fist pump with your tiny sausage like fingers as you approached the edge of the bookcase. You carefully sat at the edge and began to pull the string on the dress, making sure you went slowly so you didn't get too sick again, you grew to doll size, then up to about a toddler size. Feeling your weight about to become too much for the shelf, you began to lower yourself down. You climbed down the book shelf as though it were a climbing wall. After a minute or two of careful climbing you reached the ground and grew yourself up the rest of the way. Closing you eyes so you didn't see the room change size before your eyes, you stopped yourself from growing at close to your mom's normal size and made your way back out to the living room.

When you got there you were a little surprised by what you saw, Briana was looking under the couch still hoping to find you, and your mom was sitting on top of a laundry basket reading a newspaper, one of your mom's favorite past times. And under the laundry basket was a barking mad Janet. Curious what earned Janet this punishment you asked, "What did Lucky get up to to earn that?"

When she saw you Briana ran up and gave you a hug, it looked like you had only grown yourself up to about a little over 4 feet tall because she still was a head taller than you. "Lucky was a bad dog so I put her in puppy jail. She went to the basement and was trying to put on Janet's stuff!"

"Was she now?" You said staring daggers into the laundry basket, and to your pleasure you saw Janet look meek and sorry. "Well we wouldn't want something bad to happen to Lucky, she might hurt herself. So your first fun chore as the big girl of the house is pick up all of the clothes and put it where Lucky can't find it. After all, you don't want Lucky to accidentally choke herself do you Briana?"

"No! I love Lucky!" Briana said as she went to the basement to put up all of Janet's magically washed clothes in a place Janet could never reach it. 'That's another problem taken care of.' You thought happily as you then felt your stomach rumble. Looking at the clock you were stunned to see it was already evening. It looks like Hide and Seek took a lot longer than you'd anticipated. After Briana returned from her assignment you said, "All right girls, let's finish off the pizza and then you guys can get ready for bed."

"But mom! I'm the big girl! I want to say when we go to bed!"

Rolling your eyes you say, "Fine, you girls can stay up for a while and do whatever you want, but I need to leave and...get Lucky some dog food. I might be out all night so I hope to see you all in bed by the time I get back." Briana seemed to think this was a fair compromise. So the 3 of you sat down to have some cold pizza for supper. Briana took care of feeding Janet this time. Although instead of just giving her the meat from the pizza, Briana kept making Janet do tricks. But Janet seemed to be hungry herself so she did all the tricks Briana gave her without a second thought. You were having so much fun watching your sister roll over and play dead, you forgot to try and limit 'Minnie's diet as she once again downed a whole pizza despite her petite body. Finally once everyone was full, you looked at the sun setting and knew it was time for your heist. You kissed the girls goodbye leaving Briana in charge (what could possibly go wrong?) and made your way to the school.

The school damage hadn't been exaggerated, the place looked like the flooding had done a lot of damage to the school with the walls obviously damaged and the grounds leading up to the school looking like a marsh. But wet feet weren't going to stop you from finally getting your gym clothes and your real body back. You sloshed through the muck and approached the door to see your first obstacle you'd have to deal with.
1131112112222232113221132211311131.title: You win the game

choices: The school pantry, overrun with mice.
The science lab, with someone still working there!
The main office, with a lost and found box.
11311121122222321132211322113111312.content:
Unfortunately, your public was built at the bottom of a hill. So, all the water in the area met at the bottom forming a bit of a swamp. Despite the area looking abandoned, you knew that everyone around the neighborhood would complain when the students got rowdy during lunch outside. For that reason alone, you weren't in any hurry to go giant mode. Especially since you were going to be stuck that way for 10 minutes.

"Small mode it is," you said with a slight giggle.

You scan around the area for the best target of entry. All the doors are either locked or fused shut from water damage. And all the windows are barred so that way no hobos break in to sleep there. You, instead, turn your attention for any small openings in the walls.

You find a particularly dry patch of ground near the science labs, the main office, and the school cafeteria. Unfortunately, that's on the opposite of the school as the gym, but it's probably going to be your safest bet. Crawling through the walls as a bug is a good way to get squashed without there being a chance of the school coming down on you by shifting some stone. And some spots like a bit dangerous.

The wall you've found is solid cement save for the large crack between the bricks. Probably where some mice were getting in and out for the winter. Definitely not in danger of collapsing any time soon. And if you went all the way down to 10 centimeters, you should be able to fit in with no issue.

Glancing around one last time for any signs of people watching you, you tug at the left string and the dropping sensation fills the pit of your stomach again. Down and down and down you go, as you look down and see the ground become much closer than it was just a few seconds ago. Your stomach gets queasy as the rest of you gets a whole lot smaller.

Soon the tiny crack in the wall is starting to look like a miniature cave entrance. Your entire chubby body wobbles in place as your shrinking comes to a halt.

"Hmm, dark," you comment while looking into the narrow passage. "Good thing I thought ahead."

You reach around inside your cleavage and pull out your cellphone. A neat little trick you picked up when you noticed that your underwear would change size with each transformation. And it helped that you were coming prepared this time around. For added measure, you had even collected a tiny bottle of laundry powder in case of emergencies. You flick on the miniature light and illuminate the way into the tunnel.

Even at 10 centimeters tall, you find the space incredibly cramped as you hold your breath a few times. This isn't helped by your mother's stout body shape.

"Jeez, mom. Would it kill you to lose a little weight?"

The smell doesn't make matters much better. With the pipes leaking, the stench has seeped into the very walls of the building. You're going to give this dress an actual real wash just to get it clean when you're through here. Thankfully, there is a light at the end of the tunnel.

That's when you find...
11311121122222321132211322113111312.title: Subtle Shrink Approach

choices: You make it to the hallway without being caught
Alice catches the tiny woman in the lab
Alice starts to change, that wasn't soda she was drinking
113111211222223211322113221131113122.content:
Holding your breath as much as you could to not deal with the gases leaking out of the pipes you felt yourself going light headed as you approached the light at the end of the tunnel. You squeezed and squeezed uncomfortably as you 10 cm tall body finally popped out through the crack in the wall. Gasping for fresh(er) air you laid down on the tile floor. Looking around you recognized the stools and tables around you. "Dang, I'm in the science lab. The gym is on the other side of the building. Oh well, I'll just take a breather and before growing and making my way there."

As you lay there enjoying not feeling as though you were toothpaste being squeezed out of the tube, you didn't even wonder why the light was on in the science lab. But that answer was opened as you heard a voice, "Looks like it's almost ready."

Hearing a voice got your heart pounding, you stood up and ran under the nearest table for cover. Who the heck was in the closed down school's science lab after sundown. Cautiously you looked towards the sound of the voice and saw a pair of shoes, and inside of those shoes were the body of a humungous woman. Well, not that humungous by normal standards, you guessed by how tall she was compared to the table she was actually pretty petite and maybe 4'8" if that. But to you right now this girl was a monster who could crush you if she saw you. So you clung to the leg of a table trying to make sure you stayed out of sight. But the girl wasn't looking at anything other than what was on her table. Judging from the flashing light on the table, the girl was using a bunsen burner for some sort of experiment of something. At one point she put on some rubber gloves and held a beaker full of red liquid up to the florescent light for a better look at it. And as she held it up, you got a better look at her and were surprised to see that you recognized her.

It was a classmate of yours. Her name was Alice if you remembered correctly. You remember that she was a big science nerd and spent most of her free time in this very lab. "Maybe she never left, maybe she's been hear since school closed and never left." You said half joking to yourself. As you watched her, you saw her pick up a different beaker, this one full of black liquid, and gasped as you watched her drink it.

Is she nuts? Is she trying to kill herself? ...No John you're being stupid. That was just probably coffee or soda or something. Your mind was racing but it eventually calmed down a tiny bit as you thought, Actually I think I remember Alice just being kinda weird and quirky and just drank her sodas out of beakers. At least I hope it was soda.

As fascinated as you were by Alice, you had a mission to complete and you wouldn't finish it by gawking at a quirky classmate. You looked around and saw that the door to the lab was thankfully opened so you could get out of there without having to grow yourself to open it. Slowly you began to sneak as quietly as you could to the door.
113111211222223211322113221131113122.title: The science lab, with someone still working there!

choices: Alice simply has questions for you.
Alice wants to experiment on you with her chemistry.
You give Alice the slip by getting stuck in the walls.
1131112112222232113221132211311131223.content:
"It's working!"

The slight bellow from across the room stops you from exiting the lab door. You turn around and look up at Alice. She's knocked the stool over and is grasping at her stomach. You soon see why.

The once portly looking young woman starts to look thinner. Every part of her is beginning to wither away. Well, except her breasts and hips, which maintain a sizeable mass while the rest of her slims down. It's hard to tell from your angle on the floor, but she also appears to be growing taller too. Like all the fat her body is absorbing is going to her height instead to make her more of the "ideal" body shape.

In fact, after dropping all that weight and growing a few inches into the mid five foot range, you have to admit that she kind of looks hot.

Though you don't get to admire her for very long.

What sounded like a deflating balloon fills the air. Her clothes, which had loosened from the lack of excess weight, instantly filled up with her flesh. For the briefest of moments, she looked like an overinflated balloon as her entire body exploded outwards and her height decreased back to normal. A deep frown was on her face as she looked down at herself.

"Drat," she muttered while patting her belly. "I thought for sure it would work that time."

What would work? You paused in your escape to observe the curious girl. Granted, since yesterday, you felt you had seen just about every magical transformation you could think of with the clothes. You wouldn't have thought that chemistry could also be used to alter oneself. You've never heard of that before.

"What the heck kind of science is that?" you wonder out loud.

Unfortunately, you didn't speak softly enough. Alice's big blue eyes look directly in your direction. They widen at the sight of you and you suddenly realize the danger you're in being spotted as you are.

"Shit!"

You don't waste any time running off into the school hallway, keeping to the walls for guidance. It's dark enough that you can barely see several feet in front of you and the same goes for Alice too as she opens up the science lab door behind you.

"Hold on a minute," she calls out with using her cellphone as a light source. "Where did you go? I have so many questions for you!"

Getting spotted right out of the gate was not how you planned this night to go. You could only imagine what fate you would be subjected to and with your stomach, you won't be able to grow again for another five minutes so you can properly explain yourself. You dive behind some locker as Alice goes stomping by.

"Great," you whisper to yourself. "Now I have her to worry about."

You can only hope that being so small and in the dark, Alice didn't get a good enough look at you to recognize your mom's face. Though she certainly knows you're here as she calls out into the hallway.

"Come on out. I'm not going to hurt you, I swear! I just have questions for how you could get that small!"

A trick. Or is it?

You have been hanging around Janet so much that you're expecting anyone who sees you at a disadvantage to take an opportunity to one up you. However, seeing what Alice had been working on, you wonder if her words are true and she just does want to question you. She's clearly working on something to alter her form. You briefly consider revealing yourself. Helping her and then she can help you find your gym clothes in this mess of a school.

Then again, it might just be safer to continue on alone. Involving other people in this mess may only prove problematic.

You aren't left to ponder your choices very long as Alice shines her light in your direction and finds you with a gleam in her eye.

"There you are!"
1131112112222232113221132211311131223.title: Chemistry to Change

Alice carries you to the lab, she has something she wants you to drink

11311121122222321132211322113111312231.content:
"Please don't run away! I just want to talk to you miss little person! But if 'little person' is offensive to you I don't mean it as an insult, I just want to talk to you about your magnificent existence. I've never in all my 17 years of studying science on this earth I've never met anyone who astounds me as much as you." Alice said taking huge steps towards you and squatting down trapping you against the wall.

"But how have you studied science for 17 years. You're only 17 yourself?" You said unable to stop yourself from pointing out the weird wording of the girl who was currently about 50 times your size.

Alice looked to the sky and spoke as though she had a higher purpose, "I believe that as long as I've been in existence I've been studying science whether it be through learning how the ligaments and musculature of the body works through learning how to walk to discovering how hormones and estrogen work on the female body when stimulated physically and mentally by the young men in chemistry class. I have been studying science my whole...wait a moment. How did you know I was 17?" Alice squinted her eyes and brought her light down upon you even more intently. Maybe it was the feeling of what felt like a heat ray being shot down at you, or maybe it was because Alice seemed willing to talk rather than use you as a test subject, but you felt like it was best to be honest in this moment.

"Actually, crazy story. Really crazy story. I'm John Wallace." And so you told your unbelievable tale of discovering the magic laundry detergent to Janet getting rid of all your clothes to sneaking into the school to find your last bastion of hope in the form of probably mildew ridden gym clothes. "And that's why I'm here. I need to turn back to myself. So, if you could just pretend you didn't see me, I'll just grow to a normal size and get my stuff and everything works out well."

"John, what are you talking about? How can you ask me to pretend I haven't seen the most miraculous scientific discovery in the last century! I thought I was onto body changing modifications myself but to hear and see this technology already exists is a sight to behold! Years of research and hypothesis have been proven plausible thanks to you. I have to know more. I have to know how it works! You have to let me know more. Let me work with you!" Alice seemed to have a frenzied look to her eyes. That was a look that you knew not to say no too especially with you being in such a vulnerable position at only 10 centimeters tall.

"Ok, you can help me out, first let's..." But before you could tell Alice what to do, she was already in action. "Fantastic! But we must act quickly to best understand how all of this works and to do that we must take the first step towards enlightenment." With that Alice held out her hand offering you to walk on it.

113111211222223211322113221131113122311.content:
You hadn't been carried before in your shrunken state. With some tentative steps, you accepted Alice's offer and walked onto her palm. There was a huge rush as she hoisted you high into the air and you struggled to keep your balance.

"Whoa," you squeak. "Okay, this isn't going to work."

"What if I grabbed you like this?"

She closes her hand around you and holds you like she was holding an ice cream cone. A bit too tightly too as she knocked the wind out of you. You tap her giant fingers with your tiny hands.

"Too tight," you cough. "Too tight."

"Well, I need to carry you somehow. What about...?"

From your lightheadedness at being squeezed, you don't even realize that Alice is carrying your over her chest. And over her massive breasts. You yelp slightly as she drops you within her cleavage and you settle into place between two mountains of soft flesh. It's warm and a blush creeps over you as you find yourself firmly stuck in place.

"Better?" Alice asks, looking down at you.

"Better, I guess..."

"Then let's carry on!"

Your seat in her cleavage jiggles around as Alice begins to take giant steps through the hallway. Using her cellphone in her hand, she lights the way forward and you can see just how much damage the flooding did to the school.

When you get to the classrooms, there's a literal river going through the hallway. Alice has to stop for a minute to remove her socks and shoes.

"Suddenly I'm glad to have a free hand," she chuckles as she carries her shoes in her other hand.

"I never did ask," you said. "But why are you here? Everyone cleared out when the flooding happened, right? Did you break in too?"

"Not so much broke in more so than never left. I think they forgot about me working in the labs and I was taking a nap in the closet when the flooding happened, on account of passing out from staying up for three days straight."

"Oh, jeez. Why were you staying up for so long?"

"I was in the middle of a breakthrough! You actually saw my most recent results of the project, actually. I'm trying to become more normal."

"'More normal'?"

"I'm well aware that I'm not exactly an average female. I've always been on the short side. And I tend to overeat which makes me...Larger than is acceptable. I was hoping to find a way to counteract all that. Dieting would help, certainly. But that doesn't fix my height problem."

Even from your angle under her chin, you can detect a slight frown on her face before she shakes it off.

"Besides that...Think of all the applications such a discovery can provide. If we could shrink people to your size, we could solve world hunger! And you said you can grow to thirty feet tall?"

"Well, I haven't tried it yet but..."

You decide that you can appreciate Alice's motives well enough. She's just a curious girl who has her head more in science than anything else. When this is all over, she might be an excellent ally. Especially since Briana had offered to be a test subject for you after winning that hide and seek game.

Eventually, after wadding through two inch water, Alice arrives to the doors to the gymnasium on the other side of the school.

You watch her put her cellphone away and grip the handles of the door. Unfortunately, despite all her effort, she can't even force it to budge.

"Oh dear," she says. "The water damage must be worse than I thought. I can't move it an inch. And this is the only way into the locker rooms."

You think for a moment. With all that you know from Alice, she seems more than willing to help. She's given you a hand thus far without any reason to think she'd betray you. Perhaps you can trust her with this one task.

"Alice, do you mind setting me down on the ground somewhere?"

She gives you a confused look before gently prying you from her bosom. You're carefully set down on a dry spot on the floor as you commit your plan into action.

"You better stand back," you said. "It's about to get crowded in here."

When she's a safe distance, you begin pulling at the right string on your dress.

As the clothing expands, so do you. Alice's eyes widen as she takes another step back, mind analyzing what she's witnessing for future study. The dress explodes outwards and you with it. Soon you go from doll sized to on a level with Alice. It looks like her eyes are going to pop out of her head when you start to get even bigger than that.

You have to be mindful of the ceiling in the school, so you won't do thirty feet. But you decide to get big enough so you can punch down the door. When the top of your head starts brushing the roof of the hallway, you slow down pulling at the string and look down at Alice.

Compared to the giant she was just seconds ago, you find the situation has much reversed. You don't have an estimate for your height, but given how she only comes up to your knees, you're probably over fourteen feet tall. When Alice senses you're done with your growth spurt, she gingerly approaches you while rubbing at her portly chin.

"Fascinating, it happens instantaneously! And you can do this at will?"

"I need about a ten minute cooldown or else I get sick to my stomach from the change in perspective," your voice rumbles the entire school. "Which is why I need you to check the locker room for me. I'll be too big to fit through the door like this."

You approach the gym door and wind up for a kick. It only takes one before the metal barrier gets smashed, letting in the built water pour into the hallway, flooding where you're standing. For you, it only comes up above your ankles. But Alice finds herself standing in almost knee deep water. Her jeans are completely ruined by the foul mixture of sewage water and whatever has been stewing in the gym all this time. There's a stench coming from within the gym, like it had been the source of one of the pipes bursting. You suddenly feel glad you're not the one to go exploring in such a mess.

"Can you do that for me, Alice?" you ask. "Locker number 219 in the boy's room."

You sense that Alice would much rather spend time spending you, but she snaps herself out of it and says. "Certainly. I'll be right back."

Finally, you can get your old clothes back and put this tiresome quest to bed.
113111211222223211322113221131113122311.title: A Free Ride

A beaker of grey liquid.  She liquified your gym clothes
An washed apron from the lab, but who wore it last?
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.content:
You squatted in the hallway uncomfortably in the sewage as you waited for Alice to return with your gym clothes so you could finally be yourself again. As you felt some pain well up in your knees you felt regret that you had made yourself so tall you couldn't even stand normally in the hallway to pace to get the anxiousness out of your system. Nervously you tapped your foot on the ground creating small tidal waves to go throughout the school. After a little over a minute of silence you heard Alice call you from the boy's locker room. "It's locker number 219?"

"Yes it is, it's by the ground in the second row. Near the back."

"I see that...but are you sure it's number 219?"

"Yes! I know my own locker number Alice."

"Oh, okay." Alice said not sounding confident. Finally she came emerged from the gym holding a wet lump in her hands. "You found them!" You practically shout out for joy. But Alice didn't seem to share your enthusiasm.

"I'm so sorry John." Alice said as she held out the gym clothes in her hands. At least, you think they were gym clothes. It looked like she was holding out two small piles of soaked confetti. She held the both up one in each hand. What you think were your gym shorts looked more like a the ugliest hula skirt you'd ever seen with just a few strands of cloth dangling from a piece of elastic. That left your gym shirt which looked like it might be the colar of the shirt and some of the thicker seems still in place, but it looked more like a bunch of balled up string.

Alice said softly, "I'm sorry, but your locker got warped by the liquid and not only that but the open locker seemed to have become a home for a bunch of rats who made a nest of your clothes. I'm so sorry. Do you think you can still turn back with this?"

"I doubt it." You said feeling defeated. This was it. It felt like the end. You'd never get to be John Wallace again. What next? Pretend to be your mom the rest of your life? Become Janet and really leave her as a dog forever? You were so down you couldn't even get pleasure out of the thought of torturing your older sister. You just wanted to curl up in a ball, but you were too big to do that comfortably.

Alice looked at the deflated giant woman and a fire lit behind her eyes. "Let's not give up yet! There's still hope! So long as we have that laundry powder there is hope. To the lab!" And Alice sprinted as fast as she could as she sloshed through the knee deep dirty water. Not wanting to be alone now you followed her, although you had to crawl on your hands and knees to get through the nasty halls. You finally made it back to the lab where Alice was already waiting inside setting something on a burner.

"Quick! Give me some of the chemical compound you brought with you!" Alice shouted with enthusiasm. You simply offered her the powder you had brought with you and let her take it as you wondered if maybe it'd be better if you became a dog too. It seemed like it'd be easier than being mom.

After a few minutes of mixing and boiling and experimenting Alice shouted out, "Eureka! I think I've done it!" She went out into the hallway and said, "Shrink down to about my size and come in here. I might have a solution. Maybe. Please, you've got to come in, do it for me. Do it for yourself. Do it for science!"

Figuring you might as well see what Alice was doing you pulled the string on the dress and shrank down to about 4 feet tall and entered the lab in what was now waist high water. When you walking in Alice handed you something and said, "Try it!" You looked down and saw what Alice was offering to you.
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.title: Tattered Remains

choices: You end up as a mixture of both you and your mom.
You are able to change between you and your mom at will.
You can take your old body, but only for an hour at a time.
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.content:
"What in the world?" you asked, staring at what Alice was offering you.

It was a glass beaker filled to the brim with some sort of grey, viscous liquid. It was almost to the point that it was paste and looked about as appealing as bland oatmeal. Though Alice kept insisting by how she held it up to you.

"Drink this," she said. "This is a mixture of both your gym clothes in liquid form and the laundry powder."

"The laundry powder?" you reply. "Isn't that chemicals? You said they were yourself. Shouldn't that be toxic to consume? Let alone what you even did to liquidize my clothes."

"I used a perfectly safe mixture I've been formulating for some time now. And I ran a brief test on what was inside the chemical compound. There's nothing toxic and it appears that most of it is all natural. It should be safe for consumption."

"Should be?"

"There's always room for error," she continued, rolling her eyes. "I want to run further tests on the compound later, when there's more time. But right now, I'm sure you need to get home."

You checked your phone, which you still keep between your breasts. It's 3 AM. You didn't even realize it had gotten so late. Being mopey while waiting for Alice must have eaten all of your time. You need to be back soon to make sure Briana and the others were okay.

You glanced up from your glowing screen and glared at the beaker still in your face.

"What will it do?" you asked.

"I'm not quite sure. Given what you described, the mixture requires an 'imprint' of someone's DNA and mimics it in the wearer. I've provided the mixture a full copy of yourself. This should be your very essence in a jar, in theory."

"How bland," you muttered, seeing how grey and tasteless the substance looked.

"Smells quite piney and like clean laundry," she replied, sniffing the concoction. "I won't force you to drink it, John. There's plenty of tests I can run on this. But I just wanted to help. And this is the only way I could think of that might work."

You scowl and look down at yourself. Be stuck in a body not your own for the rest of your life or risk drinking whatever mystery soup Alice has conjured together for you. Whoever offering you this choice was a sadistic bastard who seemed content to watch you get into more and more trouble. If it was your fate to put your faith in Alice, then you resigned yourself to bear whatever choices would come from it.

"Hang on," you state, while unzipping your dress. "Have anything I can wear in the meantime?"

Whatever will happen, you don't want the magic of the dress interfering with the change. To that end, you remove the dress and the underwear you had been wearing with it. It's almost like losing an old friend. Alice provides you with one of her lab coats, which are unaffected by the laundry powder. Given how you're presently shorter than she is, the coat is quite loose on you. You stand atop one of the chairs to avoid the flooding in the room. It appears to be getting worse since you busted down the gym door.

Alice folds your old clothes up and watches you intently as you are handed the beaker. "Ready?"

"As I'll ever be," you reply.

You give one that look at the mixture before closing your eyes and draining it into your mouth.

It's not quite as bland as you were expecting it to be, though it's not unpleasant to taste. Alice was right to call it piney, as your entire mouth feels like you just brushed your teeth with a hint of freshness. Though the liquid is very gooey and thick. It slides down your throat like maple syrup and you keep it going until the entire glass bottle is drained.

Alice sat on the table across from you, trying to avoid the rising water. "Feel anything different?"

You pat your stomach as the concoction settles in.
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.title: Essence of You

choices: Your mom has her body and memories back and you're in trouble
Alice stopped by bright and early to begin experimenting
Briana still thinks she's in charge and wants to play with her new sister
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.content:
"I don't know Alice, I don't even feel any different. Just in case we need it, is there something in the lab that can make me...make me throw..." You weren't able to finish your thought as you put your hand over your mouth to cover up the largest belch you'd ever had. It was so loud some of the glass tubes on the counter were shaking from the sound. It wasn't just your stomach that was rumbling either. From your mom's red topped head down to your mom's chubby little toes you felt your insides quaking. It was as though your body had become a water ballon that had been put in a paint shaker. Everything in your body was jerking around, you couldn't even focus on Alice who had a look of fascinated horror in her eyes. You body expanded and shrank by inches and feet every few seconds. Your head was spinning. You had no idea how long you could possibly take this when all of the sudden it stopped.

You don't remember falling to the floor but at some point you did. You were on all fours and had barely stopped your face from being submerged in the disgusting water on the floor of the flooded school. With feelings to being sick over the toilet you let out a retch and vomited. You had expected to see the thick grey substance you had just drank, but you only threw up clear saliva. Whatever you had drunk had already made it's way through your body. But what body did you have.

"A mirror." You rasp, your voice didn't sound like your mom's anymore, but you had to be sure. Alice got a small mirror out of her lab kit and put it in front of your face. There looking back at your was a very pale and exhausted looking face. But you were relieved to see that it was your face looking back at you again.

"I'm me again. I'm finally me again." You said too exhausted to jump for joy, but you seemed to be the only one ready to celebrate as you heard Alice say, "Well...not quite...but it's very close."

"What?" You said in confusion. You stood up to see what she meant, and it didn't take long to notice. You stood on shaky legs and looked down to notice the first two big differences in your body. "I have man boobs!" You said as you held them under the lab coat.

"Well...I wouldn't say they're man boobs." Alice said pointing down. You were afraid to looked, but look you had to. In the middle of your transformation your lab coat had burst open from the front it seemed and you were showing off your newly formed womanhood for Alice and the world to see.

"I'm a girl." You said a bit shellshocked.

"But you still look like yourself. At least in the face. So that's something." Alice said as she began to take notes. You didn't care what she was writing about, you need to see yourself fully. You left the lab and ran into the boys bathroom across the hall to look at yourself in a bigger mirror. Looking back at you was a familiar face, but not much else. There was the obvious changes to sexual organs, but that wasn't all. While before you had prided yourself on maintaining a pretty healthy weight, form the look of your now you were probably a good 250 pounds. Maybe more. And while you were now back to being taller than your fairly petite mom, you had lost a few inches of your natural height. You guessed you were about 6'0". Pretty tall for a girl, but shorter than yourself. And you even found a streak of your mom's red hair amongst your curly black mop top.

You were no longer yourself and it looked like you weren't ever going to be again. But despite that, you found yourself smiling. "I have my face again. That's the big thing. Everything else I might be able to change into something closer to mine later. I still get to be John Wallace again." You smiled to yourself and tied up the lab coat and went back to Alice who was still furiously writing notes.

"I'm going to go ahead and grab my mom's clothes and get out of here. I don't suppose you mind me taking this lab coat. I kinda need to wash it so I can be able to turn into me...well...this me again."

Alice didn't even stop write as she said, "Go ahead, it's not mine and doubt the school will notice a missing coat. But I do hope I might be able to drop by your home sometime soon if you don't mind. I'd love to experiment more with this scientific marvel you keep in your laundry room."

"Please do." You said, it was the least you can do for the girl who helped you get your face back.
____________________________

You yawned as you collapsed on your bed back home. You'd put the lab coat on the wash overnight, taken a shower to get the filth from the school off of you, and it seemed the house was still standing with Briana in charge, a pleasant surprise. You enjoyed dreams of beautiful women, magic, money, fame, and everything good in life. But alas dreams can not last forever and real life along with it's problems and complications must continue on as you would see the next morning when a female hand woke you up.

Try enhancing your DNA in the lab coat.
Wake Briana and use her as a test subject.
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.content:
"Good morning, John."

You opened your bloodshot eyes into the face of a rather preppy looking chubby girl staring right back at you smiling. You had barely a moment to collect your scattered thoughts as well as remember what happened last night.

"Are what...OMPH!"

You were pulled to your feet in an instant. You were surprised that Alice could push you around so much until you looked up at her. She was taller than you again. That's when you realized what you were wearing. The size-changing dress. You were back in your mom's body again at four feet tall. Meaning Alice hovered over you again. You must have slipped into it before going to bed and leaving the lab coat in the wash.

"What happen...WHOA!"

No sooner than when you had your feet on the ground, you found yourself getting tugged in the other direction out of your bedroom. Alice had a very forceful personality, it would seem. As your head was catching up with what was going on, you noticed that the house was still very much dark.

"Alice?" you managed to blurt out. "What time is it?"

"Oh, about oh six hundred. 6 AM, you want to use typical language."

"6 AM!? I barely got two hours of rest, Alice."

"Two hours is just enough to enter the REM sleep cycle. There will be plenty of time for napping once we get the burners going, if you truly need it."

"How are you even awake at this hour? You look like hell."

That much was true. Even in the dim light of the coming sunrise, you could tell that Alice was running on fumes with her hair tangled and her eyes like swollen sacks. How many all nights at the school had she pulled, you had to wonder.

"It's nothing a few cups of coffee can't fix. Trust me, I've looked worse. And how could I possibly sleep when I'm so close to witnessing the discovery of a lifetime?"

"The what now?"

"Don't you remember what you promised me last night?"

With your morning brain and little sleep, you had much difficulty pouring over what exactly was said during your grand heist. You did sort of promise Alice that she could run the gambit of researching the properties of the laundry powder, didn't you? Kind of? She had apparently taken those words to heart.

"Right, right," you muttered. "Let's just...Get this over with so I can get some proper rest."

"Where's your sense of adventure, John? Now come on. I've already taken the liberty of preparing the lab."

You wonder what Alice means by that as she continues to guide you downstairs and through your house. The trip allows you to witness what had become of your sisters and mom the night before.

You pass by Briana, still in your mother's body, asleep on the couch and surrounded by bags of Oreo cookies and potato chips. Apparently, that power went a little to her head. You almost kick a laundry basket on the floor only to discover Janet sleeping inside of it soundly. There's a weight on top of the basket as well as a piece of paper with the words "Doggy Jail" written on it. You could only imagine what Janet had done to merit that, but at least it kept her out of trouble.

Your actual mother is nowhere in sight, though you assume she's in her bedroom.

The biggest surprise comes when you see what Alice has done to your basement.

"When did all this stuff get here?"

"Oh, I just brought a couple of supplies I had with me. I always carry around a few vial and beakers. The rest is all just chemicals around your basement that I borrowed and you wouldn't miss. You'd be amazed what you can find in a simple storage closet at home."

She set up a table in the corner near the washing machines with tubes and glass containers running all about it. She created a makeshift burner out of a tin can and some candles. It would almost be comical if you didn't know that she was dead serious about all this. Atop of the washing machine, you spy the lab coat from earlier. The one that has your face but not your body.

"I took the liberty of finishing your laundry for you," Alice continues, holding up the lab coat proudly. "Now, I believe that there might be a way to use your DNA within this article of clothing and enhance it, so to speak."

"I don't follow..."

"If the chemical compound in the laundry powder works the way I think it does, it takes the DNA of whoever last wore the outfit before the wash and applies it to the wearer. The safest way to test this theory will be to do some basic cause and effects with the clothing we have already."

You note the other pile of clothes atop of the washer Alice has already washed and folded.

"Alright, that makes sense..."

"However, this lab coat has traces of both your DNA and your mother's. That's why you became a sort of hybrid. There may be a way to alter this genetic makeup so it's not quite so half and half. You'd be more you than your mother, if that makes sense."

"Kinda..."

"I'm open to suggestions though! I'm just eager to been the experiments. We can start wherever you'd like."

At least she was leaving the choice up to you. You pondered her options and thought of an alternative as well. Briana did promise yesterday that she would be willing to subject herself to any experiments you wanted to run. She'd make for a good test subject with Alice.
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.title: The Early Bird Gets Experimented On

choices: Alice hands you a dog collar
Alice gives you what seems to be a bed sheet
Alice wants you to stay doll sized for 24 hours
1131112112222232113221132211311131223111.content:
"Well, I guess I could just show you some of the changes I can do to myself with the clothes that are already washed. That'll be the easiest and most basic thing to do." You said as you went to the pile of clothes and you noticed that you didn't recognize any of the clothes as your moms or either of your sisters.

"I went ahead and went to the store after I left the school and got a whole lot of clothes of different sizes to see the effect they'd have."

"You didn't have to do that, I already have a decent collection of different sized clothes here. I already told you about how my little sister was doll sized most of the day yesterday."

Alice shook her head, "No you misunderstand, those clothes already have been tainted by your and your families DNA. "Now we're going to experiment with what counts as clothes or not."

"What do you mean?" you ask. "Clothes are clothes."

"Of course, everyone is going to have their own definition of what counts as clothing. But we need to see what the limit is with the laundry powder. Does it just affect cloth or is there more to it?"

You sleepily nodded along as Alice produced what appeared to be a large bed sheet. Well, large from your perspective as a foot tall doll dancer. It was probably for a twin sized mattress.

"Now," she said. "Take off that outfit and wrap this around you like a towel."

You did as requested, stripping out of the ballerina outfit. It was rather strange looking down at your miniature body. You had gotten so used to mom's meatiness that you almost felt uncomfortable in someone's skinny form. Though your breasts were still as large as oranges and your hips gave you a proper figure.

You did your best to cover yourself up with your hands as Alice's lumbering figure handed you the bed sheet. As commanded, you did your best to wrap it around yourself. Given there was so much sheet for so little body, this proved difficult.

Eventually, you were standing around in a sea of blanket sagging off of you.

"Now what?" you ask.

"Evidently, nothing," Alice replied after waiting a solid five minutes for some sort of change. "It seems like there is a limit to what the powder considers clothing. That makes sense, I suppose. Else you could accidentally wrap a blanket around yourself and morph into a deformed monstrosity. But I wonder if the limit is just cloth."

She turned to a small basin off to the table, which you couldn't see the top of given your stunted perspective. Alice returned with something tiny in your hand.

"Now we'll see if it just applies to cloth or leather material or not."

She held out something small and plastic in her hand. You recognized it as one of those pocket-sized doll clothes that they'd sell in stories. The ones with plastic clothing. They were made for a doll only a couple of inches tall. You noticed they were wet, like Alice had been soaking them in a bath of the laundry powder.

"This will determine what counts as a wash," stated Alice. "As well as see if the compound extends to plastic."

She lowered her hand so you could grab the tiny, pink outfit. You escaped the mess of bed sheets, which she took to folding, and proceeding to fit yourself into the soft plastic wardrobe.

It was a little uncomfortable, given that the plastic had far less softness to it compared to cloth. However, the moment your leg passed into the dress, you could feel the tingling compression sensation again. Your entire lower half shrunk down so you could fit into the outfit with relative ease. This was followed by your arms and torso. Pretty soon, you were a two inch tall woman with a gigantic bobble head. Though that swiftly began to shrink too after a few minutes wearing the dress.

"How interesting," Alice muttered. "I wonder now if it has something to do with the shape of the outfit. Or perhaps something more."

As she thought for a minute, you couldn't help but be a little intimidated. This was the smallest you had ever had, even smaller than the 10 centimeters you had gone down too in the dress. Worse still, you didn't see anything within reach to get you back to scale if Alice decided to take advantage of you.

"I wonder..." Alice thought for a moment.

She grabbed another thing from her pile. This time she returned with a dish rag that looked more like a blanket at your size.

"Try this again, John," she said, tossing it your way. "Only this time, try looking at it more like an outfit than clothes."

"What do you mean?" you squeaked.

"You were looking at the bed sheets as sheets, correct? I have a theory that needs testing. This isn't a rag, I'm giving you. It's a dress. Repeat it after me once you wear."

You rolled your eyes and got to work removing the plastic outfit.

Wrapping yourself with the hand rag proved challenging given your miniature scale, but you managed it much in the way you handled the bed sheets before. You stood there with giant Alice looming over you.

"Now try saying it," she said with a soft voice, though at her size it came across as intimidating.

"This is a dress," you say. "This is a dress. This is a dress."

"That's it. Think it."

You put the thought that you were wrapped in a hand towel far from you mind and tried to imagine the rag around your well-endowed chest as some sort of exotic dress. That's when you started growing.

Granted, your height only increased back to about one foot tall, but you had certainly begun to grow up to match the size of the makeshift dress so that it would fit you comfortably. Your curves hugged the rag tightly as you stood proudly as Alice took her notes.

"Fascinating. The compound requires some level of work from the user. If you see something as clothing, then it's going to recognize it as such."

"What does that mean?"

"It means my horrible sewing might not be as big a detriment as I feared. But that's for later. Let's move on now..."

"One more, okay?" you say. "I'm really tired, Alice. And all these experiments are starting to drain me."

"Hmm. I wonder if the transformations require energy on your part to achieve. Musings for later. Very well. One more experiment."

She returns to her pile and comes back to you with...

Only made of clouds.

That's when you noticed something building up at the very tip of your tail.

A solid object began to form on the floor. You knew from watching Aladdin enough times with Briana exactly what it was. A genie's lamp that bounded you in servitude. As if to drive home that point, two metal bands formed around your wrists.

By the curious look on her face, she knew this was true too. She reached down with her stubby little hands and grabbed the lamp.

"Fine," you said, crossing your arms. "Can you please change me back to normal so we can move on? Or, better yet, wish me back to my boy body. You can do that, right?"

"I can," Alice said with a smile on her face. "But then I would still have two wishes left. Why waste them? Aren't you the least bit curious to see what this new power will grant you, John?"

"I'd much rather go to bed, Alice. I'm still exhausted even as a supposedly all-powerful genie."

Though she did make an interesting case. How powerful were you as a genie? Or was it limited powers because of the laundry powder? Either way, the choice was completely out of your hands. Alice was the one with the lamp. And you had to obey her every whim, or so the voice in your head told you so.

Alice tapped her lip in thought on how to proceed.

When you emerged into the living room the voice of your mom called from the kitchen, "Joan! Could you set the table and could you send Briana into the kitchen to help with supper?"

"Sure mom." You said, you bent down to pick up Briana to get her there fast but she stopped you. "I can do this!" She said happily and she pointed at herself with her left arm and grew up and up until she was taller than you, she had to be at least 6' 6". Your plucked eyebrows raised, that wasn't normal...was it? Could she always grow stuff? As you made your way to the kitchen you were rubbing your temples with your long nailed fingers. You felt like you knew all the answers to the questions you were asking but had somehow forgotten them. After setting the table your sister Janet...no...it's Minnie. Minnie is your only other sister. She walked in and sat poured Janet...no there's that name again. Minnie poured Lucky some dog food into her bowl. Minnie looked at you with concern and asked, "Joan? You're no looking great, do you need to lay down?"

"I'm good, everything is good." You lied as you finished setting the table just in time for Briana and Alice...who was Alice? Your mom's name was Sarah. You shook your head in confusion as the two carried a 3 feet long cooked turkey and dropped it on the table. "Thanks for helping with the turkey Briana, now we've got enough leftovers for the week."

"Yeah! I helped." Briana seemed with pride as she sat down. Your mom looked at you and asked, "What are you doing wearing that ridiculous halloween costume, it's the middle of summer."

"I have a reason I think." You said trying to remember that reason and Briana cut in saying, "She's going to play in the dollhouse with me and picked that costume. Mommy? Minnie? Can you play too?"

Minnie shrugged and said, "Sure." And mom smiled wide as she said, "Well, I had a great day at the lab tonight. We've been doing amazing things with the human body that I can't wait to show you all one day. So why not, let's have fun in the dollhouse tonight." Mom's a scientist? That doesn't seem right.

You slowly ate your enlarged turkey trying to get a grip on the fluid situation before you. Something was wrong, but were you even able to do anything about it? Should you just go with the flow and just enjoy life and stop fighting the world?
